info.stepTitle: Step 1: Obtain  Memorandum of Association (MOA) (if applicable)

entities.title: Abu Dhabi Judicial Department
entities.location: Al Khaleej Al Arabi Street - Al Rowdah Area - next to Zayed Sports City - Abu Dhabi

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Emirates ID (Original) + copy for the records
- The document "Partnership Contract" to be attested: one copy for each concerned party + a copy for the records
- Original trade name for review and a copy for their records

entities.title: Abu Dhabi Judicial Department
entities.location: Al Khaleej Al Arabi Street - Al Rowdah Area - next to Zayed Sports City - Abu Dhabi

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Emirates ID (Original) + copy for the records
- The document 'Power of Attorney' to be attested: a copy for each party + a copy for the records

info.stepTitle: Step 3: Rent and Attest a Property

entities.title: Department of Municipalities and Transport (DMT)
entities.location: 7th Floor, Al Mamoura Building - Block B, Al Muroor Road، 4th St

details.title: Fees structure
details.text: Rent contract value Attestation Fees : AED 100 + 5% of rent contract Value

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Owner Emirates ID
- Passport (Copy)
- Residency visa (Copy)
- Personal photos (Copy)
- Application form
- Tenants Emirates ID (Original, if applicable tenant Authorized Deputy power of attorney)

details.title: Service delivery time (duration)
details.text:
Renting a property: 7 days
Attestation of the contract: 15 Minutes

info.stepTitle: Step 4: Open a bank account for your company

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Passport (Copy)
- Emirates ID (Copy)
- Copy of sponsor's passport
- Copy of partner's passport and visa
- Copy of license
- Copy of tenancy contract
- Copy of MOA or service agent agreement

info.stepTitle: Step 5: Request for a maintenance and decor permit

entities.title: Department of Municipalities and Transport (DMT)
entities.location: 7th Floor, Al Mamoura Building - Block B, Al Muroor Road، 4th St

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Maintenance Contractor Assignment Letter
- Maintenance Contractor Trade License
- Owner's ID (or Power of Attorney, or Investor's ID )
- Power of Attorney
- Recent Photos for the 4 sides of the commercial unit
- Tenancy contract
- Trade License

details.title: Other
details.text: This is applicable only if the property does not already have this permit

entities.title: Civil Defense Authority
entities.location: Zayed Sport City, Arab Gulf Street, Near to Shaikh Zayed Mosque

details.title: Fees structure
details.text: None - fees are paid with issuance of license

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Trade licence (Copy)
- Certificate of Membership from the Chamber of Commerce and Industry
- Facility lease contract
- Designated verified signature(s) for the facility
- Drafted location and floor plan (to scale) of the facility
- Passport (Copy)
- Emirates ID of facility owner(s) (Copy)

details.title: Service delivery time (duration)
details.text: 30 minutes for the request There may be physical visits (depending on the activity), otherwise you can expect a call and clearance over the phone

details.title: Other
details.text: In some special instances, the Civil Defense Authority may approve without a visit (depending on the activity) - you can contact them directly to clarify this matter.

info.stepTitle: Step 7: Request NOC for practicing Food business activities

entities.title: ADAFSA
entities.location: Mohamed bin Zayed City opposite Mezyed Mall - Abu Dhabi

details.title: Fees structure
details.text: AED 0 - AED 1000 per activity Total fee depends on the number of listed activities in economic license

details.title: Documents issued
details.text: No Objection Certificate (NOC) for Practicing Food Business Activities

entities.title: ICA
entities.location: 19th - Shakhbout Bin Sultan St - Abu Dhabi

entities.title: TASHEEL
entities.location: Search the most convenient branch to your location

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Commercial License(Original)
- Passport(Original)
- Emirates ID(Original)
- MOA & POA

info.stepTitle: Step 13: Application for residencies, work permits, insurance, and emirates ID for employees

entities.title: Ministry of Human Resources & Emiratisation
entities.location: Musaffah Industrial M25, Abu Dhabi

entities.title: ICA
entities.location: 19th - Shakhbout Bin Sultan St - Abu Dhabi

entities.title: TASHEEL
entities.location: Search the most convenient branch to your location

details.title: Fees structure
details.text: AED 5,000+/employee (amount may vary depending on job title, and category of company)

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
For each employee:
- Copy of employee passport
- One photo
- Education certificate
- Labour file number
- Original e-signature card

details.title: Documents issued
details.text:
- Visa (passport stamp)
- Work permit
- Insurance
- Emirates ID

details.title: Contact type
details.text:
- Online (for the application)
- New hires will be required to do physical medical tests + physical biometric finger print scans

- Copy of tenancy contract
- Copy of MOA or service agent agreement

info.stepTitle: Step 5: Request for a maintenance and decor permit

entities.title: Department of Municipalities and Transport (DMT)
entities.location: 7th Floor, Al Mamoura Building - Block B, Al Muroor Road، 4th St

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Maintenance Contractor Assignment Letter
- Maintenance Contractor Trade License
- Owner's ID (or Power of Attorney, or Investor's ID )
- Power of Attorney
- Recent Photos for the 4 sides of the commercial unit
- Tenancy contract
- Trade License

details.title: Other
details.text: This is applicable only if the property does not already have this permit

entities.title: Civil Defense Authority
entities.location: Zayed Sport City, Arab Gulf Street, Near to Shaikh Zayed Mosque

details.title: Fees structure
details.text: None - fees are paid with issuance of license

details.title: Documents to be submitted
details.text:
- Trade licence (Copy)
- Certificate of Membership from the Chamber of Commerce and Industry
- Facility lease contract
- Designated verified signature(s) for the facility
- Drafted location and floor plan (to scale) of the facility
- Passport (Copy)
- Emirates ID of facility owner(s) (Copy)

details.title: Service delivery time (duration)
details.text: 30 minutes for the request There may be physical visits (depending on the activity), otherwise you can expect a call and clearance over the phone

details.title: Other
details.text: In some special instances, the Civil Defense Authority may approve without a visit (depending on the activity) - you can contact them directly to clarify this matter.
